nav.$description: Background color for the navigation strip in the desktop variation of the Header.

default.$description: Text color for menu items in the navigation strip when using the desktop variation of the Header.

hover.$description: Text color for menu items in the navigation strip when using the desktop variation of the Header.

nav.$description: Border (stroke) colour exclusively for use in highlighting focused menu items in the Header navigation strip.

default.$description: Sets the height of the Logo, when used in the HeaderBody subcomponent.

small.$description: Sets the height of the Logo, when used in the Drawer or 'small' variation of the HeaderBody subcomponent.

simplified.$description: Sets the height of the Logo, when used in the 'simplified' variation of the HeaderBody subcomponent.

default.$description: Sets the variation of the Logo, when used in the HeaderBody subcomponent.

small.$description: Sets the variation of the Logo, when used in the Drawer or 'small' variation of the HeaderBody subcomponent.

simplified.$description: Sets the variation of the Logo, when used in the 'simplified' variation of the HeaderBody subcomponent.

default.$description: Background colour for the default variation of the SmallHeader.

invert.$description: Background colour for the inverted variation of the SmallHeader.

default.$description: Menu icon colour in the default variation of the SmallHeader.

invert.$description: Menu icon colour in the inverted variation of the SmallHeader.

default.$description: Icon colour for the default variation of the SmallHeader.

invert.$description: Icon colour for the inverted variation of the SmallHeader.

default.$description: Border (stroke) colour for the dividers between icons in the default variation of the SmallHeader

invert.$description: Border (stroke) colour for the dividers between icons in the inverted variation of the SmallHeader

default.$description: Border (stroke) colour exclusively for use in highlighting a focused, interactive element in the SmallHeader.

invert.$description: Border (stroke) colour exclusively for use in highlighting a focused, interactive element in the inverted variation of the SmallHeader.

default.$description: Interim boolean token to indicate if the default variation of the SmallHeader has a dark-coloured background colour.

invert.$description: Interim boolean token to indicate if the inverted variation of the SmallHeader has a dark-coloured background colour.
